name: Confirmation of receipt of application and voted ballot
text:
[§15D-Confirmation of receipt of application and voted ballot.  The chief election officer, in coordination with local election officials, shall implement an electronic free-access system by which a covered voter may determine by telephone, electronic mail, or Internet whether:
     (1)  The voter's federal postcard application or other registration or military-overseas ballot application has been received and accepted; and
     (2)  The voter's military-overseas ballot has been received. [L 2012, c 226, pt of §1]
